'''''gorgor''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "terror, haunting fear",<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 233</ref> "extreme horror".<ref name=AC>{{WJ|AC}}, p. 415 (Author's note 28)</ref>
==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[NGUR]]<ref name=AC/>
==Examples==
*[[Cirith Gorgor]]
*[[Ered Gorgoroth]]
*[[Plateau of Gorgoroth]]
